availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William M. Burnett (Spencer County, Kentucky, teacher)

body.p: Spencer County, Kentucky, teacher. Kentucky native. Son of James Morrison Burnett and Rhoda Brown Burnett. Married to Ann Mariah Robertson Burnett in Shelby County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1852. Teacher in Spencer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District 1, p. 21.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259274, p. 178 of 704 microfilm.
"William Allen Burnett, Jr.,"U.S., Sons of the American Revolution Membership Applications, 1889-1970March 31, 1960, p. 106 of 640 microfilm.
Find A Grave, "William Morris Burnett (1823-1903)," Memorial #181329418, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/181329418 (accessed December 1, 2020).
